info.title: ScholarShare
info.description: ScholarShare MVP - Backend API for discovering student opportunities

get.description: Health check endpoint.

Basic health check - confirms API is running.
Used by Railway/Render for health monitoring.
Database health check - confirms DB connection works.

post.description:
Login endpoint for all user types.

How it works:
1. User sends email + password
2. We find the user in database
3. We verify the password hash matches
4. We create a JWT token with user_id
5. We send back the token

The user then includes this token in future requests:
Authorization: Bearer <token>

get.description:
Get the logged-in student's profile.

Returns combined User + Student data including demographics.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

patch.description:
Update student profile information.

Only updates fields that are provided in the request.
Useful for:
- Completing profile after first login
- Updating contact info
- Updating demographic data

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

Change student password.

Used for:
1. First-time login (changing temp password)
2. Regular password updates

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

get.description:
Get all GLOBAL opportunities (not college-specific).

Supports:
- Pagination
- Filter by category
- Filter by type
- Search by keyword
- Exclude/include expired

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

Get opportunities specific to student's college.

Only returns opportunities linked to the student's college.

Get full details of a specific opportunity.

Returns complete information including description, eligibility, etc.

post.description:
Set student's status on an opportunity.

Status options:
- interested
- saved
- applied
- not_interested (requires reason)

If status already exists, it will be updated.

get.description: Get all opportunities the student has marked as 'saved'.
Get all opportunities the student has marked as 'applied'.

List all opportunity categories.

Used by students to filter opportunities by category.
Returns categories sorted by name with post counts.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

post.description:
Upload Excel file to create student accounts in bulk.

Excel format required:
| name | email | reg_no | dept | course | year | phone | date_of_birth | gender | city | state |

Required columns: name, email, reg_no, dept, course, year
Optional columns: phone, date_of_birth (YYYY-MM-DD), gender, city, state

- Creates User accounts with temporary password (default: reg_no)
- Creates Student profiles
- Students must change password on first login

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

get.description:
Get list of all students in the admin's college with filters.

Filters:
- search: Search by name, email, or registration number
- dept: Filter by department
- course: Filter by course
- year: Filter by year (1, 2, 3, 4)
- min_engagement: Minimum engagement score (0-100)

Returns aggregated metrics (no per-opportunity details).

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

parameters.name: search

schema.description: Search by name, email, or reg_no
schema.title: Search

parameters.description: Search by name, email, or reg_no

get.description:
Get basic metrics for the admin's college.

Returns simple counts (no charts for MVP):
- Total students
- Students who have logged in
- Students who haven't logged in
- Total college opportunities posted
- Total applications on college opportunities

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

List all available categories for opportunity creation.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

schema.title: Response List Categories Api V1 College Admin Categories Get

post.description:
Create a college-specific opportunity.

Only visible to students from this college.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

get.description:
List all opportunities created by this college admin.

Includes engagement stats for each opportunity:
- total_interested, total_saved, total_applied, total_not_interested
- total_not_engaged (students who haven't interacted)

Filters:
- category_id: Filter by category
- type: Filter by opportunity type
- search: Search in title
- include_expired: Include expired opportunities (default: false)

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

post.description:
Upload image for a college opportunity.

Supported formats: jpg, jpeg, png, webp
Max size: 5MB

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

get.description:
Get students who have NOT engaged with a specific opportunity.

"Not engaged" means:
- Student has NO record in opportunity_status table for this opportunity
- They haven't marked interested/saved/applied/not_interested

This is the non-redundant way to find "unseen" opportunities:
- No separate "seen" table needed
- Uses existing opportunity_status table
- Students without a record = haven't interacted = "not seen"

Supports:
- Search by name, email, or registration number
- Filter by department, course, year
- Pagination

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

parameters.name: search

schema.description: Search by name, email, or reg_no
schema.title: Search

parameters.description: Search by name, email, or reg_no

get.description:
Get detailed per-student analytics for a COLLEGE-OWNED opportunity.

Shows:
- Which students interacted
- Their interaction type (interested/saved/applied/not_interested)
- Reasons for not interested
- Breakdowns by dept/year/reason

Only works for opportunities created by this admin.
Does NOT work for global opportunities.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

post.description:
Create a new global opportunity.

Opportunities created by moderators are NOT automatically verified.
They need superadmin approval before being visible to students.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

get.description:
List opportunities created by the current moderator.

Includes engagement stats (interested/saved/applied/not_interested counts).

Filters:
- pending: Not yet verified
- verified: Approved by superadmin
- archived: Archived opportunities
- category_id: Filter by category

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

Get full details of an opportunity created by this moderator.

Includes engagement statistics:
- total_interested: Students who marked as interested
- total_saved: Students who saved for later
- total_applied: Students who applied
- total_not_interested: Students who marked as not interested

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

put.description:
Update an opportunity created by this moderator.

Note: Updating a verified opportunity will reset verification status.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

delete.description:
Delete an opportunity created by this moderator.

Note: This permanently deletes the opportunity and all related data.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

post.description:
Upload image for an opportunity.

Supported formats: jpg, jpeg, png, webp
Max size: 5MB

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

get.description:
List all available categories for opportunity creation.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

schema.title: Response List Categories Api V1 Moderator Categories Get

post.description:
Create a new college.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

get.description:
List all colleges with stats.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

Get college details.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

put.description:
Update college details.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

delete.description:
Delete a college.

Only allowed if college has no students or admins.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

post.description:
Create a new college admin account.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

get.description:
List all college admins.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

post.description:
Reset a user's password.

Generates a temporary password that the user must change on first login.
Works for students, moderators, and college admins.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

get.description:
List all opportunity categories.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

schema.title: Response List Categories Api V1 Superadmin Categories Get

post.description:
Create a new opportunity category.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

put.description:
Update a category name.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

delete.description:
Delete a category.

Only allowed if category has no opportunities.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

get.description:
List all opportunities pending verification.

These are opportunities created by moderators that need approval.

Filters:
- category_id: Filter by category
- type: Filter by opportunity type

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

List ALL opportunities in the platform.

SuperAdmin can see everything with full filtering.

Filters:
- category_id: Filter by category
- type: Filter by opportunity type
- status_filter: pending, verified, archived
- search: Search in title

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

post.description:
Verify (approve) an opportunity.

Once verified, the opportunity becomes visible to students.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

Reject an opportunity.

Rejected opportunities are archived with the rejection reason.
The moderator can see the reason and create a new corrected opportunity.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

Archive an opportunity.

Archived opportunities are hidden from students but not deleted.
Can be used for outdated or problematic opportunities.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

Unarchive an opportunity.

Restores a previously archived opportunity.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

get.description:
List all moderators with their stats.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

post.description:
Create a new moderator account.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

get.description:
Get platform-wide statistics.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

post.description:
Submit a batch of analytics events.

Mobile app should:
1. Collect events locally in a queue
2. Send batch every 30 seconds OR when app goes to background
3. Max 100 events per batch

Event types:
- session_started: When app opens
- opportunity_viewed: When student views opportunity detail
- opportunity_applied: When student marks as applied
- opportunity_saved: When student saves opportunity
- search_performed: When student searches (include query in event_data)
- opportunity_shared: When student shares opportunity

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

get.description:
Get Daily Active Users (DAU) for the admin's college.

DAU = unique students who opened the app (session_started event).

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

Get event counts by type for the admin's college.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

Get engagement metrics for a specific opportunity.

Returns:
- total_views: How many times viewed
- total_saves: How many times saved
- total_applies: How many applied
- total_shares: How many shared
- unique_viewers: Unique students who viewed
- conversion_rate: applies / views * 100

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

Get activity summary for a specific student.

Only works for students in the admin's college.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

Get complete platform overview (SuperAdmin only).

Single endpoint with all key metrics for the dashboard:
- User metrics (total, active, new)
- Engagement metrics (sessions, views, saves, applies)
- Conversion funnel rates
- Daily trends (last 7 days)
- Top categories and types

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

Get platform-wide DAU (SuperAdmin only).

Can optionally filter by college.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

Get platform-wide event counts (SuperAdmin only).

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

Get engagement metrics for any opportunity (SuperAdmin only).

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

Get activity summary for any student (SuperAdmin only).

Unlike college admin endpoint, this works for ANY student.
Essential for pilot phase debugging and support.

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

Get top opportunities by engagement (SuperAdmin only).

Sort options:
- views: Most viewed opportunities
- applies: Most applied opportunities
- conversion_rate: Best converting opportunities

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

Compare engagement metrics across all pilot colleges (SuperAdmin only).

Essential for pilot phase analysis:
- Which colleges are most engaged?
- Which need more support/outreach?
- How do colleges compare to platform average?

Returns:
- Per-college metrics (students, activation, sessions, conversion)
- Platform averages for comparison

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>

Get engagement funnel metrics (SuperAdmin only).

Shows the conversion funnel:
View  Save  Apply

Includes:
- Overall funnel metrics
- Breakdown by category
- Breakdown by opportunity type

Headers required:
    Authorization: Bearer <token>
